savings_account.name: Savings Account
savings_account.description: Basic savings account for emergency funds and daily liquidity needs. FDIC insured up to LKR 1,100,000 per depositor per bank.
savings_account.examples: Commercial Bank Savings Plus, HNB Salary Saver, Sampath Savari, NSB Savari, People's Bank Sahana

fixed_deposits.name: Fixed Deposits (Time Deposits)
fixed_deposits.description: Guaranteed fixed returns for a specific period (1 month to 5 years). Principal protected. Best for capital preservation and short-term goals.
fixed_deposits.examples: Commercial Bank FDs (9-11%), HNB Time Deposits (9-10.5%), Sampath Bank FDs (8.5-11%), NDB Fixed Deposits (9-11%), BOC Fixed Deposits (8.5-10%)

treasury_bills.name: Treasury Bills (T-Bills)
treasury_bills.description: Short-term government securities (91, 182, 364 days). Backed by Government of Sri Lanka. Zero default risk.
treasury_bills.examples: Available through Central Bank auctions, primary dealers (DFCC, NDB, Commercial Bank Treasury), or Unit Trust funds

government_bonds.name: Government Bonds (Treasury Bonds)
government_bonds.description: Long-term government securities (2-30 years). Regular interest payments (semi-annual). Sovereign guarantee.
government_bonds.examples: Sri Lanka Development Bonds, available via EPF contributions, Unit Trusts, or directly through primary dealers

corporate_bonds.name: Corporate Debentures
corporate_bonds.description: Debt issued by corporations. Higher returns than government bonds but with credit risk. Check credit ratings (ICRA, Fitch).
corporate_bonds.examples: DFCC Bank Debentures, Commercial Bank Debentures, John Keells Holdings Debentures, Hayleys Debentures, Dialog Axiata Debentures

money_market_funds.name: Money Market Unit Trusts
money_market_funds.description: Invests in short-term government securities and money market instruments. Better than savings accounts, highly liquid.
money_market_funds.examples: NDB Wealth Money Plus Fund, CAL Money Market Fund, Acuity Money Market Fund, Guardian Acuity Money Market Fund

income_unit_trusts.name: Income/Bond Unit Trusts
income_unit_trusts.description: Invests primarily in government bonds and high-grade corporate debt. Stable returns with capital preservation focus.
income_unit_trusts.examples: NDB Wealth Gilt Edge Fund, CAL Income Fund, Softlogic Gilt Edge Fund, Guardian Acuity Income Fund, JB Vantage Income Fund

balanced_unit_trusts.name: Balanced Unit Trusts
balanced_unit_trusts.description: Mix of equities (30-60%) and fixed income (40-70%). Balanced risk-return profile for medium-term investors.
balanced_unit_trusts.examples: NDB Wealth Balanced Fund, CAL Growth & Income Fund, Softlogic Balanced Fund, Guardian Acuity Balanced Income Fund, DCSL Balanced Fund

equity_unit_trusts.name: Equity Unit Trusts
equity_unit_trusts.description: Invests primarily (80%+) in CSE-listed stocks. Professionally managed. Higher growth potential with volatility.
equity_unit_trusts.examples: NDB Wealth Eagle Fund, CAL Equity Fund, Softlogic Equity Fund, Guardian Acuity Equity Fund, JB Vantage Equity Fund, DCSL Equity Fund

cse_blue_chip_stocks.name: CSE Blue Chip Stocks
cse_blue_chip_stocks.description: Large-cap, established companies on Colombo Stock Exchange. Lower risk within equity segment.
cse_blue_chip_stocks.examples: John Keells Holdings (JKH), Commercial Bank (COMB), Hayleys (HAYL), Dialog Axiata (DIAL), LOLC Holdings, Sampath Bank (SAMP), Tokyo Cement

cse_growth_stocks.name: CSE Growth Stocks
cse_growth_stocks.description: Mid and small-cap stocks with high growth potential. Higher volatility and risk. Requires research and monitoring.
cse_growth_stocks.examples: Bairaha Farms, Royal Ceramics, Access Engineering, Sunshine Holdings, Ceylon Cold Stores, Cargills Ceylon, Browns Investments

etf_funds.name: Exchange Traded Funds (ETFs)
etf_funds.description: Passively managed funds tracking market indices. Low expense ratios. Trade like stocks on CSE.
etf_funds.examples: Colombo Stock Exchange S&P SL20 ETF (tracks top 20 companies)

real_estate.name: Real Estate Investment
real_estate.description: Property investment for rental income or capital appreciation. Illiquid but tangible asset. Consider location carefully.
real_estate.examples: Residential properties (Colombo, Kandy, Galle), Commercial properties, Land banking in developing areas

gold.name: Gold Investment
gold.description: Hedge against inflation and currency depreciation. Physical gold or gold savings accounts.
gold.examples: Physical gold (jewelry, coins, bars), Ceylinco Gold Saver, Commercial Bank Gold Saver, HNB Gold Savings

epf_contribution.name: EPF/ETF Contributions
epf_contribution.description: Mandatory retirement savings for employees. EPF: 20% (12% employer, 8% employee). Tax-free returns.
epf_contribution.examples: Employees' Provident Fund (EPF) - managed by Central Bank, Employees' Trust Fund (ETF) - 3% employer contribution

investment_rules.emergency_fund_rule: Build emergency fund equal to 6 months of expenses before aggressive investing
investment_rules.debt_payoff_rule: Pay off high-interest debt (>15% p.a.) before investing in volatile assets
investment_rules.age_equity_rule: Equity allocation = 100 - Age (Conservative Sri Lankan approach: 80 - Age)
investment_rules.diversification_rule: No single stock should exceed 10% of portfolio; No single asset class should exceed 40%
investment_rules.rebalancing_rule: Review and rebalance portfolio at least annually
investment_rules.liquidity_rule: Maintain at least 10-15% in highly liquid assets
investment_rules.epf_optimization: Maximize EPF contributions - risk-free 10%+ returns with tax benefits

conservative.description: Capital preservation focused. Suitable for retirees or very risk-averse investors.

moderate.description: Balanced growth and income. Suitable for middle-aged investors with medium risk tolerance.

aggressive.description: Maximum growth focused. Suitable for young investors with high risk tolerance and long time horizon.
